title: How many text messages can be saved on my phone?
answer:
[A conversation supports a maximum of 500 text messages or 50 multimedia messages. (You can set the number of text or multimedia messages allowed in a conversation.)]() 

 No limit is set to the total number of text or multimedia messages saved on a phone. The total number of text or multimedia messages that can be saved on a phone depends on the free space on the phone.
